pr_title: Add support for timestamp with local zone in Hive3

timeline.message: Add support for timestamp with local zone in Hive3

timeline.bodyText:
You might want to rebase to master. We need to implement WriteObjectInspector.
Also we need to test for them as well
timeline.author: pvary

replies.bodyText: I've done a merge with master, and this class IcebergTimestampObjectInspectorHive3 doesn't seem to implement WriteObjectInspector yet even on master. I can add a similar convert method that we have for IcebergTimestampObjectInspector.
replies.author: marton-bod

timeline.bodyText: Could we test that the same instant with different offset will result in the same TimestampTZ?
timeline.author: pvary

timeline.bodyText: How can we be sure that this epoch seconds really result in the expected TZ?
timeline.author: pvary

replies.bodyText: Refactored this to use LocalDateTime instead
replies.author: marton-bod

timeline.author: pvary

replies.bodyText: this null check is handled in the else branch
replies.author: marton-bod

timeline.message: Add convert method to timestamp inspectors
Add Hive3 unit tests for HiveSchemaUtil

timeline.author: pvary

replies.bodyText: we did, but we shouldn't :) fixed
replies.author: marton-bod

timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: I think it should always be all uppercase, but I've changed it just to be safe.
replies.author: marton-bod

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to use super and add only specific fields?

replies.bodyText: yes, changed it to use super

timeline.bodyText: We do not check nanos. Do we want to do it?
